TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A synthetic luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone (LH-RH) antagonist that suppresses LH and sex steroid levels.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Antagonista sint√©tico de la hormona liberadora de hormona luteinizante (HLHL) que suprime la hormona luteinizante y las concentraciones de esteroides sexuales.
